title: Breakfast & Tea
description: Bar Cupola supplies sweet and savoury platters for Breakfasts and Morning Tea Functions.
notes: This menu is a sample only. Minimum order of certain items will apply, so check with us when ordering. For deliveries outside of Angel Place, a separate charge may apply.

Savoury Options.title: Breakfast wrap
Savoury Options.description: Chorizo sausage and tomato avocado salsa. Cut into halves.

Savoury Options.title: Mini breakfast roll
Savoury Options.description: Scrambled eggs and bacon (on turkish bread)

Savoury Options.title: Mini quiche
Savoury Options.description:
Ham cheese tomato and shaved almonds 
 and/or 
 Mushroom cheese and parsley

Savoury Options.title: Mini croissant
Savoury Options.description:
Ham and cheese 
 and/or 
 Spinach, cheese and mushroom

Savoury Options.title: Mini corn cake
Savoury Options.description: Served with tomato avocado salsa and minted yoghurt

Sweet Options.title: Pikelet with triple berry jam and cream
Mini plain bagel
Sweet Options.description: Served with crème cheese and strawberry jam

Sweet Options.title: Portuguese nata (custard tart) with sprinkle of cinnamon
Breakfast trifle
Sweet Options.description: Served in a glass layered with muesli, yoghurt, honey and raspberry

Sweet Options.title: Individual fruit salad served in a glass
Sweet Options.description:
Fruit platter 
 Small, medium or large

title: Sandwich Lunch
description: Includes gourmet sandwiches, cold cuts, lunch meats and fresh salads.
notes: This menu is a sample only. Minimum order of certain items will apply, so check with us when ordering. For deliveries outside of Angel Place, a separate charge may apply.

Choice of bread.title: Regular sandwich bread using wholemeal, white, rye and multigrain breads (cut into quarters)

Sample fillings.title: Crumbed chicken schnitzel, avocado, tomato, romesco salsa and mayo
Poached chicken, avocado, bacon and lettuce
Crumbed eggplant, zucchini, and crumbled bulgarian fetta with smoky capsicum relish
Tandoori chicken fillets, tomato, cucumber, minted yoghurt
Tuna, black olives and spanish onion with cucumber and tomato
Sauteed mushroom and spinach with provolone
Smoked salmon, crème cheese, avocado and rocket
Roast beef, caramelised onion, fresh tomato, cheese
Turkey, cranberry, tomato, cheese and avocado
Prawn, avocado, diced celery and thousand island
Ham, fresh tomato, cheese and lemon mayo

title: Buffet & Salad
description: Main courses and salads served bistro style.
notes: This menu is a sample only. Minimum order of certain items will apply, so check with us when ordering. For deliveries outside of Angel Place, a separate charge may apply.

Salad Menu.title: House Salad with green beans, tomato, avocado, poached pears and honey walnuts
Warm salad of haloumi, slow roasted tomatoes, beans and beetroot
Nicoise style salad with soft boiled egg, asparagus, avocado, tomatoes, potatoes, olives and crisp bruschetta
Caesar salad with poached chicken, bacon and croutons
Panzanella (italian salad with crisp italian bread)
Roasted tomato and baby bocconcini salad
Rare roast beef thai style salad
Brown rice, roast pumpkin, beetroot, pinenuts, baby spinach and fetta

Buffet Menu.title: Caramelised honey and soy chicken fillet
Veal schnitzel coated with a pramesan, herb and fetta crumb
Crumbed veal schnitzel with napolitana sauce with melted mozzarella *
Whole roast chicken with rosemary, thyme and mixed spices (cut up into 8 pieces)
Sausage and canneloni hotpot with roasted sweet potatoes
Chicken fillet with quinoa salad, almonds and currants
Kumera, provolone and nutmeg ravioli with parmesan and crispy sage
Lamb ravioli with wilted spinach, roast tomato, olives, basil, pinenuts tossed in pesto
Penne with beef bolognese and grated parmesan
Fusili with grilled chicken, carrot, zucchini and honey mustard butter
Stir-fry hokkien noodles with chicken and prawns with choy sum and shredded omelette

title: Formal
description: Lunch / Dinner, three courses served in an elegant manner.
notes: This menu is a sample only. Minimum order of certain items will apply, so check with us when ordering. For deliveries outside of Angel Place, a separate charge may apply.

Entrée.title: Salt and pepper squid
Entrée.description: with asian herb salad and palm sugar-lime juice dressing

Entrée.title: Oysters served three ways
Entrée.description: tempura, natural, with eschallot balsamic dressing

Entrée.title: Seared scallops
Entrée.description: served on potato fennel gratin with tomato confit and fennel puree

Entrée.title: Smoked trout cakes
Entrée.description: with herbed crème fraiche, chive tomato and preserved lemon salsa

Entrée.title: Potato gnocchi
Entrée.description: with gorgonzola sauce, spinach and pinenuts

Entrée.title: Zucchini flower fritters
Entrée.description: stuffed with ricotta, pinenuts and lemon with a lime mayonnaise

Entrée.title: Roast quail salad
Entrée.description: with, apple, baby beetroot, hazelnuts, cress and citrus dressing

Entrée.title: Wonton dumplings
Entrée.description: in a soya bean chicken broth with baby spinach
